alert.note: Alert for Bexar (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 2:51PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Bexar County through 330 PM CDT... At 251 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Terrell Hills, or near San Antonio Int Airport, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... San Antonio, Universal City, Live Oak, San Antonio Int Airport, Stinson Municipal Airport, Kirby, Alamo Heights, Windcrest, Terrell Hills, Olmos Park, Elmendorf, China Grove, Calaveras Lake, Converse, Castle Hills, Buena Vista, Martinez, Losoya, Southton and Sayers. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
